name: I Have a Plan to Take Down One of the Four Emperors!!
type: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Supernovas/Heart Pirates
effect: [Main] Look at 4 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Supernovas} or {Straw Hat Crew} type Character card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
